And in this sense I would understand the words now in hand : '⁸‘ The Jews have no such dealings with the Samaritans as to be obliged to them for any courtesy or benefit received from them: they ask or receive nothing from them gratis; they borrow nothing of them, which is not for- bidden them as to any other nations.'’

“ Form three days before the feasts of the idolaters, it is forbidden [the Jews] either to given to or receive from them, to ask, or lend, or borrow of them :’' but for any other parts of the year it was not forbidden them.
